The subtext of your liberal opinions are easy to read. You are a hot mess.This silly Hollywood 'party girl' and aging bed hopper should study human psychology and s e x u a l i t y as it applies to her own genus and phylum. But, I don't know...is there any hope when you have to space out the word ' s e x u a l i t y ? '
